website_summaries.verdict: This kit includes everything you need to create colorful and vibrant jewelry, making it great for anyone, from beginner to expert.
pros: Included beads are of high quality
Convenient case keeps all supplies together and is nicely organized
Includes pictures to provide inspiration for creating beautiful jewelry pieces
Available in different color schemes to suit any style
cons: Some kits have arrived without instructions

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed to create lovely jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains the most beautiful beads and findings EVER. Well-priced so it is a very good kit for beginners. It has all the tools and parts needed to create lovely items. The customer care and service they provide is above and beyond expectations. I would recommend this as a gift for anyone who wants to start making jewelry. It has everything you need from the tools to the beads. I love it. I got it for my grand daughter and now I am going to get one for myself. I recommend it if you want a complete DIY jewelry making kit. I can't wait to get started!
customer_reviews.author: L. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: You are on your own!
customer_reviews.text: * updated....After contacting Modda, they emailed me the instructions and apologized for the mess, and I changed my rating. Original: I picked this one to see if it was a hobby I would enjoy. However, there were no instructions, all beads were loose in a big bag, so my first project was to sort them all into the acrylic holder. There was a separate clear bag with the wires and fasteners. I found several empty bags in the big one so I am not sure what was supposed to be in them. Not a good start with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not impressed with this product. The case ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this product. The case holding the beads is ill-fitting The beads were all mixed together and some were coming out of the case. If it were not for the plastic bag around the case, more beads would have been lost. I don't know if any beads were actually lost since there is not an actual inventory of how many beads should be in each section, but some of the sections were a little low after sorting out all the beads. The kit did have an assortment of beads and findings. I was just hoping for more than the one page instruction sheet for pattern suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Cattitude1

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started in one set
customer_reviews.text: I like how this jewelry set comes with everything you need to make a variety of pieces. This is a fun hobby to have. I bought this for my daughter and I to have an activity to do together.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is functional and great for beginners. I loved it. The beads included are beautiful but I found more useful instructions with YouTube videos. The case that it comes in honestly sucks and the top kindof sits on top of it. If the case was close able and sturdier it would have made this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. The quality of beads are good and everything you need for a starter is there. Price worthy.
customer_reviews.author: yhsieh

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: Overall, really happy with the purchase. Seems like it would be good for teen-level beginners, it's a little advanced for my 8 year old but we enjoy doing it together. It's fun, and a good variety to explore jewlery making.
customer_reviews.author: Booniecat

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 yr old niece and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great bead set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bead set! It is easy to use and the colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my granddaughter,. The package came in tact and my daughter said she will love it. This was a good purchase for the price.. I can provide a better review after the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: smidge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much bigger package for paying almost $40!! Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: An introduction to simple jewelry making.
customer_reviews.text: I made our 3 year old niece (soon to turn 4) an elastic bracelet that she just adores. I did double the elastic for a stronger bracelet, as young ones can be a little less careful putting on and taking off the bracelet. This is a good kit to get the idea of making jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B. Enos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t as easy as we thought it would be, had to YouTube how to assemble, but it still made for a few great pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Chantia

customer_reviews.title: Packaging horrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this unless you want to put it together yourself. The packaging was torn and only taped on one side. The box itself had tape only on one side and no latch so the beads were all out of the box. Huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Todryk

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It was ok but a lot smaller then I thought it would be especially for the price.... I ordered another one of similar price and was air bigger it was just small other then that it was good
customer_reviews.author: rebekah breckenridge

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks ok, but kinda flimsy and realllllllllly small. It arrived on tome
customer_reviews.author: tangi2

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter spent hours during quarantine designing her jewelry! Appears to be great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry kit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for adult just starting to make jewelry. Timely arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 12 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old is able to follow the directions and make cute projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good lot to start making jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. Easy to follow instructions. Missing one piece, I forgot what it is called.. It has two ends and twisted in the middle. Other than that, everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki Kitner

customer_reviews.title: Quality kit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my granddaughter. Perfect kit for her. Nice assortment of quality beads,tools, and everything you need for making bracelets and necklaces! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry making kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a Xmas gift it looks like what I wanted can tell more after holidays
customer_reviews.author: Anne walker

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the price. I bought for my15 year old and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Cheeseman Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great beading set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great kit and very much fun for me and my three kids ages 4, 6 and 8.
customer_reviews.author: Elina P.

customer_reviews.title: Everything to sy
customer_reviews.text: Loved this little kit. It had everything needed to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Donna MCCann

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors. Everything came as I expected. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kendall

customer_reviews.title: My daughters made a beautiful jewelry set for their mom in a short time
customer_reviews.text: My daughters told me that they wanted to make a jewelry as a birthday present for their mom. They asked me to buy this kit and I bought it for them.The kit includes many accessories and instructions for beginners. My daughters made a beautiful jewelry set for their mom in a short time.It's amazing, it is the first jewelry that they made and they didn't have any trouble and they had lots of fun. They asked me to share a photo of their first jewelry set they made. They are going to make jewelry for themselves with the rest of beads. This was a very economical purchase for me. I also thank to the seller for good communication.
customer_reviews.author: Ismet Cem Kaba

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning jewelry making.
customer_reviews.text: There is A LOT of different things in this kit. Beads, findings, string, everything you need to learn jewelry making. This color came with instructions. I purchased the turquoise kit and it didn't have instructions. Since I'm a beginner I really need the instructions. More on that when I review the turquoise kit. With the instructions this is a great beginner kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Quality kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a must! The beads were great quality and beautiful that pictures just do not do justice! Almost everything is included if you are a beginner to jewelry making and also includes detailed instructions. The box it comes in seems better than the typical bead box kits you buy from local craft stores which to me is also a value in itself!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Surber

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter kit. Comes with instructions (I found it easier to watch some videos on YouTube). A few of the pieces aren’t listed on the instruction sheet. So I have no clue what they are for. Also some pieces were bent/broken. Overall good kit for beginners. I’ve made two pairs of earrings and was going to make a necklace, but did not have everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great afternoon of making jewelry with the girls. The blues were wonderful. There are plenty of options and they kept three girls amused for hours with many more hours in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for jewelry making projects !!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my classroom in order to make little pieces of jewelry the kids could be proud of. This kit is simply perfect for this project and there are plenty of nice pieces to go around.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Modda Jewelry Making Sets for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage granddaughter. She loves to make things to give as gifts and to sell. This is a great product to start out making jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set for young teen
customer_reviews.text: I love the bead combinations in this set. I think my granddaughter will love them too. This is a Christmas present. I plan to purchase more memory wire, etc., to go with this set.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Everything the maker needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and was pleasantly surprised by the many kinds of raw materials that were in the kit. Production just limited by the imagination of the designer. Great present for the girl, or boy I suppose, that wants to make their own designs.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this set for her birthday and loved it. 5 months later and she still uses it!
customer_reviews.author: J Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: While the kit arrived without instructions, the Modda staff was very helpful and emailed me the missing instructions and photographs of the projects. I am very impressed with both their product and the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jan W Koczera

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy little kit just to mess around and make some cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: todd gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make Christmas gifts. Very pleased with the quality and instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: My ten year granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My ten year granddaughter loved it. Made two bracelets the first night.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: The jewelry was  of high quantity
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly . Also, the product is of good quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this color but I got purple which was a little frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dundon
